title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When attempting to create a JAR file, the 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors' error message is displayed after clicking 'Finish' button.
OB: After clicking 'Finish' on the JAR packager, the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors' is displayed.
EB: After clicking 'Finish' on the JAR packager, the JAR file should be created successfully without any error messages.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a file in the project, make changes, and do not save it.
2. Open the JAR packager for the project.
3. Fill in all required fields such as path, destination, name of JAR packager description, etc.
4. Click 'Finish' to create the JAR file.
